name: Noire Detective 64
description:
A noire detective adventure with cutting-edge 64-bit graphics

When an inspector is called by Commissioner Thomson, he doesn't know what he's in for. Follow the journey of the inspector, as he interrogates witnesses at the scene, and gets to the bottom of who murdered the girl in Cobblepot Lane.

Features:
  • Top of the line 64-bit graphics.
  • 3 characters to choice from
  • action packed gameplay
  • Full mumble voice acting

Made by one person in 8 days for the "So bad it's good" Jam 2019. The theme this year was "Retro".  Story, design, voices, programming, models, and animations were all made during the Jam period.
